caption.center: Amending CINA Rule 18(d) concerning the addition of reference to

opinion.panel: Present: CARPENETI, CJ, EASTAUGH, FABE, WINFREE, and CHRISTEN, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
IT IS ORDERED: CINA Rule 18(d) is amended to read as follows:
Child in Need of Aid Rule 18. Termination of Parental Rights.
* * * *
(d) Relinquishment. (1) Notwithstanding other provisions of this rule, the court may terminate parental rights after a voluntary relinquishment pursuant to AS 47.10.089 and Adoption Rule 9. In the case of an Indian child, the relinquishment must meet the requirements set forth in 25 U.S.C. ยง 1913(c). and Adoption Rule 9(b) and (d).
* * * *
EFFECTIVE DATE: April 15, 2010.
